issue.title: [Java] Test cases in arrow-vector assume little-endian platform
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9709](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9709). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`MessageSerializerTest.testWriteMessageBufferAligned`, `TestArrowReaderWriter.testChannelReadFully` and `TestArrowReaderWriter.testChannelReadFullyEos` assume only a little-endian platform.

Two tests in `TestArrowReaderWriter` fails on a big-endian platform.
